Header.title: Software Developer
Header.paragraph: My name is Muhammad Usman Hussian and I am a web and mobile application developer.

About.paragraph: I am a MERN stack and mobile applications developer with some testing knowledge and also have some concepts of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. I also have an international certificate in AI. I can develop responsive web applications using React-redux, React Js, JavaScript HTML, and CSS, etc and use React native or Android studio for mobile applications developer and I am also currently doing a course in machine learning.
